content:
Out of the box Zulip comes with a private "core team" stream that Notification Bot uses to announce when a new member signs up: 223897499-05fb5ab7-2617-44f2-92ae-c467de1cba37.png

I'm planning on reconfiguring Notification Bot to send these announcements to #general : 223897496-c1a02a70-2736-487c-bca2-77205cd3c44f.png

That way, we should be able to safely delete the "core team" stream. If we find a need for a private stream in the future, we can create one then.

There isn't a way to delete a stream, but I was able to archive "core team".

This is after I disabled new user announcements. See https://dataverse.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/375876-zulip/topic/announcements.20from.20Zulip.20bot/near/340595706
Philip Durbin has marked this topic as resolved.
